ygData.subject: Does CHR affect Largos?
ygData.msgSnippet: OK that explains why Largos was sticking better.  I saw the mob glances around nervously message every time we fought something.  Didn t know that was the
ygData.messageBody:
OK that explains why Largos was sticking better. I saw the "mob glances
around nervously" message every time we fought something. Didn't know that
was the message for Tashan though.

Thanks
Galtin of E'ci

> >
> > What message gets displayed when an enchanter successfully casts tashan?
>
> "mob glances around nervously."
>
> > I've grouped with this enchanter on numerous occasions and I know that
> in
> > normal pulls (1 or 2) mobs, he primarily keeps stunning them over and
> over
> > again. The message on screen that popped up numerous times during the
> fight
> > was the "scintillating colors" message. I've always assumed this was
> the
> > message enchanters get when they successfully stun.
>
> Believe me, he was using tashan(i)(a). If you run across an
> enchanter who doesn't, boot him from your group. :) It has a
> ridiculously short cast time, is almost never resisted, and
> costs next to no mana. In return, it debuffs MR by about
> 20-45 points.
>
>
